buttons.styleCss: #buttonAnimation1{font-size: 1.25em;color: #000;background-color: #1197cc;box-shadow: #094c66 4px 4px 0px;border-radius: 0.5rem;transition: transform 200ms, box-shadow 200ms;cursor: pointer;text-align: center;outline:none;border: none;height: 2.8125rem;margin: 1px 3px;padding: 0.652rem 1.25rem;}#buttonAnimation1:active{transform: translateY(4px) translateX(4px);box-shadow: #094c66 0px 0px 0px;}

#buttonAnimation9{cursor:pointer;background:transparent;position:absolute;top:50%;left:50%;transform:translate(-50%, -50%);margin:0 auto;border:none;font-size:20px;padding:15px 30px;color:#000;} #buttonAnimation9::before, #buttonAnimation9::after{content:'';width:100%;height:100%;position:absolute;top:0;left:0;box-sizing:border-box;transition: top 0.5s, left 0.5s}#buttonAnimation9::before{border-left:2px solid #f4005c;border-top:2px solid #f4005c;}#buttonAnimation9::after{border-right:2px solid #f4005c;border-bottom:2px solid #f4005c;}#buttonAnimation9:hover::before{top:-4px;left:-10px}#buttonAnimation9:hover::after{top:4px;left:10px}

cards.styleCss: .card-container{width: 70%;height: 15rem;display:flex;justify-content: center;align-items: center;flex-wrap: wrap;gap: 0;border: 2px solid;border-color: #31acff;box-shadow: rgba(92, 240, 248, 0.6) 0px 0px 12px 1.2px;backdrop-filter: blur(10px);border-radius: 1.25rem;margin: 0 7px;}.card-logo{width: 100%;padding: 10px;font-size: 1.6em;display:flex;justify-content: center;align-items: center;color: white;}.card-text-container{width:100%;height: 8rem;text-align: center;color: white;}.card-title{display: block;padding: 0 0 1rem 0;font-size: 0.8rem;}.card-paragraph{font-size: 0.7em;padding:0 1rem;}@media only screen and (min-width:512px) {.card-container{width: 16rem;}}@media only screen and (min-width: 794px){.card-title{font-size: 1.1em;}.card-logo{font-size: 2.5em;}.card-paragraph{font-size: 0.7em;}}@media only screen and (min-width:1024px) {.card-container{width: 17rem;height: 17rem;}.card-title{font-size: 1.2em;}.card-text-container{height: 10rem;}.card-logo{font-size: 3em;}.card-paragraph{font-size: 0.7em;padding: 0 2rem;}}

{props.logo}
